description: A hardy, low-maintenance plant known for its air-purifying qualities and upright, sword-like leaves. Thrives in bright, indirect light but tolerates low light.
A fast-growing plant with heart-shaped leaves marbled in yellow and green. Excellent for beginners and hanging baskets. Prefers medium to bright light.
The iconic 'Swiss Cheese Plant' with large, fenestrated leaves. Needs plenty of space and bright, indirect light to grow those beautiful splits.
Nearly indestructible, the ZZ Plant handles neglect like a champ. It requires infrequent watering and can handle very low light conditions.
Known for its elegant white flowers, it's also a great natural humidifier. It will droop dramatically when thirsty, making watering easy to manage.
A popular indoor tree with large, violin-shaped leaves. Needs bright, consistent light and is sensitive to changes in environment. Requires commitment!
